answers.answer: I would see a doctor. A major change in body odor is one of the symptoms of disease, such as Diabetes or GI problems.

question: Hello, within the last week I've developed horrible body odor under my arms.  No matter what I do (showering and shaving everyday; scrubbing with baking soda, witch hazel, baking soda, hydrogen peroxide, you name it; using conventional aluminum-containing deodorant by Secret; and using natural enzyme-based deodorant), I stink within two hours of doing absolutely no strenuous work and having zero stress.  In case it's related, I just had my period last week, but I've never had this happen following any other period.  And I've NEVER had any abnormal body odors before.  I was dealing with a cold last week, so I took slightly higher doses of vitamin D, but I don't see how that could have any relation.  I haven't changed my diet, which consists of whole foods and absolutely no junk/sugary foods.  Thank you in advance for any advice.  I seriously don't know what I'll do if this doesn't stop!
title: Sudden HORRIBLE Body Odor
